app.name: DomestIQ
search.title: Thola Abasebenzi
consent.title: Imvume Yobumfihlo
consent.message: Siqoqa futhi sicubungula imininingwane yakho silandela umthetho we-POPI Act. Ngokuqhubeka, uvuma izindlela zethu zokusebenzisa idatha yakho.
landing.hero.subtext: DomestIQ inika amandla abasebenzi basemakhaya ukuthola umsebenzi oqhubekayo nophephile — futhi isize amakhaya athole usizo ngokuqiniseka. Ucingo kuqala. Zonke izilimi ze-SA ezingu-11. Abasebenzi bahlala bemahhala.
landing.worker.body: Izigidi zabasebenzi basemakhaya eNingizimu Afrika zithembele ekutshelwaneni ukuthola umsebenzi olandelayo. Uma umqashi eyeka, kungasho amasonto ngaphandle kwemali engenayo. DomestIQ ikushintsha lokho. Yakha iphrofayela yakho kanye. Utholakale. Ubhukiwe. Ubuyekezwe.
landing.worker.b1_desc: Akusekho amasonto ngaphandle kwemali engenayo. Thola izibhukingo ocingweni lwakho.
landing.worker.b2_desc: Izibuyekezo, izincomo, ne-CV ekhulayo nomsebenzi ngamunye. Ungaphindi uqale phansi.
landing.worker.b3_desc: Amakhasimende aqinisekisiwe. Yazi ukuthi usebenzela bani ngaphambi kokufika.
landing.worker.b4_desc: Akudingeki i-imeyili. Akudingeki ukuthayipha. Cindezela izithombe bese uthatha isithombe.
landing.worker.b5_desc: Bhalisa futhi uxoxe ngesiZulu, isiXhosa, Sesotho, Afrikaans — izilimi ze-SA ezingu-11.
landing.worker.b6_desc: Mahhala ngokuphelele kubasebenzi. Ugcina wonke uRandi owenzayo. Ayikho ikhomishini ethathwa kuwe.
landing.client.body: Akusadingeki ukuthembela ekutshelwaneni bese unethemba lokuhle. Bhrawuza abasebenzi abaqinisekisiwe, ababalulwe ngezinga eduze nawe. Bona umlando wabo womsebenzi, funda izibuyekezo zeqiniso, bese uxhumana ngomzuzwana.
landing.client.b1_desc: I-ID ihlolwe, amarekhodi obugebengu ahlolwe. Yazi ukuthi ngubani ongena emzini wakho.
landing.client.b2_desc: Izibalo zeqiniso ezivela emakhaya angempela, kanye nezincomo ezibhaliwe ongathemba kuzo.
landing.client.b3_desc: Ukusesha okusekelwe ku-GPS. Bona ukuthi ngubani otholakalayo endaweni yakho manje.
landing.client.b4_desc: Bhukha kanye noma njalo njalo. Ukuvumelanisa kwekhalenda. Izikhumbuzo ezizenzakalelayo.
landing.how.ws1_desc: Cindezela izithombe ukukhetha amakhono akho. Akudingeki ukuthayipha.
landing.how.ws2_desc: Amakhaya aseduze nawe abona iphrofayela yakho, isilinganiso, nokutholakala kwakho.
landing.how.ws3_desc: Khetha imisebenzi oyifunayo. Beka isheduli yakho namanani akho.
landing.how.ws4_desc: Wonke umsebenzi omuhle uthola izibuyekezo ezidonsa umsebenzi omningi.
landing.how.cs2_desc: Hlola izibalo, izibuyekezo, kanye nebheji zokuqinisekisa.
landing.how.cs3_desc: Thumela umlayezo noma ucele isibhukingo. Hlela imininingwane ngokuqondile.
landing.how.cs4_desc: Isibuyekezo sakho sisize umphakathi futhi sivuze abasebenzi abahle.
landing.services.subtext: Kusukela osizweni lwasekhaya kuye kumakhono obuchwepheshe. Abasebenzi babhalisa amakhono abo. Amakhaya athola lokho akudingayo.
landing.stories.s1_quote: Bengijwayele ukulinda amasonto phakathi kwemisebenzi, ngibuza abangani ukuthi bazi muntu yini. Manje ngithola izibhukingo njalo masonto. Izingane zami sezikwazi ukudla kahle.
landing.stories.s2_quote: Angikwazi ukufunda kahle kodwa izithombe nama-icon kwenza kube lula. Ngizibhalisile ngocingo lwami. Ngingasizwanga muntu.
landing.stories.s3_quote: Ngaphambilini, bengingenawo ubufakazi bokuthi ngikwazi umsebenzi wami. Manje izibuyekezo zami ezingu-47 zezinkanyezi ezinhlanu zikhuluma ngami. Amakhasimende angethemba ngingakafiki.
landing.stories.s4_quote: Ukuthola umsizi othembekile bekusho ukubuza abangani bese unethemba lokuhle. DomestIQ ikushintshile lokho ngokuphelele.
landing.stories.s5_quote: Ibheji yokuqinisekisa inginika ukuthula kwengqondo. Ngiyazi ukuthi ngubani oza emzini wami. Lokho kubalulekile uma unezingane.
landing.stories.s6_quote: Ngibeka amanani ami. Akekho othatha ingxenye kimi. Ngenze R8,000 ngenyanga edlule nge-DomestIQ kuphela.
landing.cta.body: Wonke umsebenzi owakha iphrofayela yakhe udala ithuba. Wonke umuzi obhukha nge-DomestIQ wakha ukwethemba. Ndawonye, sakha into iNingizimu Afrika engakaze ibe nayo — inethiwekhi ethembekile yomsebenzi wasemakhaya oqinisekisiwe.
landing.footer.disclaimer: DomestIQ iyipulatifomu yokuxhumanisa. Ayikho ubudlelwano bokuqashwa obudalwayo phakathi kwabasebenzisi.
landing.trust.t1_desc: Idatha yakho ivikelwe ngaphansi komthetho wase-SA
landing.faq.a1: Yebo, mahhala ngokuphelele 100%. Abasebenzi bagcina wonke uRandi abawenzayo. Asithathi ikhomishini emholweni wabasebenzi. Ipulatifomu ixhaswe yimali encane yesevisi ekhokhwa amakhaya.
landing.faq.q2: Ngabe ngidinga i-smartphone ukuze ngisebenzise DomestIQ?
landing.faq.a2: Udinga ucingo olungafinyelela i-inthanethi. DomestIQ isebenza kunoma yiliphi ibhrawuza le-smartphone — Android noma iPhone. Akudingeki ukulanda i-app. Ungaze uyifake naseskrini sasekhaya.
landing.faq.a3: Abasebenzi bangalayisha i-SA ID yabo nesitifiketi sokukhululwa kobugebengu. Ithimba lethu liqinisekisa la madokhumenti futhi linikeze ibheji yesihlangu segolide kubasebenzi abaqinisekiswe ngokuphelele. Abasebenzi abaqinisekisiwe bathola izibhukingo eziningi.
landing.faq.q4: Ngabe imininingwane yami yomuntu siqu iphephile?
landing.faq.a4: DomestIQ ihambisana ngokuphelele nomthetho we-POPI Act. Idatha yakho yomuntu siqu iyinkripthiwe, ayithengiswa kwabanye, futhi yabelwana ngayo kuphela ngemvume yakho ecacile.
landing.faq.a5: Njengamanje sisebenza emadolobheni amakhulu ahlanganisa Johannesburg, Cape Town, Durban, Pretoria, ne-Port Elizabeth. Siyandlala siya emadolobheni amaningi. Bhalisa manje noma indawo yakho ingakabalwa.
landing.faq.a6: Amakhaya asesha abasebenzi ngohlobo lwensizakalo nendawo, abona amaphrofayela nezibuyekezo, bese ebhukha usuku nesikhathi. Abasebenzi bathola isicelo futhi bangamukela noma benqabe. Ungaxhumana nabasebenzi ngokuqondile ukuxoxa imininingwane ngaphambi kokubhukha.
landing.faq.a7: Ngokuphelele. DomestIQ isekela izibhukingo zekanye neziqhubekayo. Noma ngabe udinga ukuhlanza okusakujulayo noma umakhi wengadi wamasonto onke, sikubhekele.
landing.faq.a8: DomestIQ isekela zonke izilimi ezisemthethweni zaseNingizimu Afrika ezingu-11 okuhlanganisa isiNgisi, isiZulu, isiXhosa, Afrikaans, Sesotho, nabanye. Abasebenzi bangabhalisa futhi baxhumane ngolimi abaluthandayo.
landing.cities.subtext: Abasebenzi namakhaya baxhuma emadolobheni amakhulu. Kukhula njalo masonto.
landing.cities.not_listed: Awuliboni idolobha lakho? Bhalisa noma kunjalo — siyandlala ngokushesha!
landing.pwa.title: Faka DomestIQ Eskrini Sasekhaya
landing.pwa.desc: Thola ukufinyelela okusheshayo ezibhukingweni, emilayezweni, nokunye.
